label: Dwarf
description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal.

features.title: Darkvision
features.text: As an action, you touch a stone object no larger than 3 feet in any dimension and imbue it with magic. For the duration, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you chose a sphere, the radius is doubled. Once used, this trait can’t be used again until you finish a long rest.

features.title: Dwarven Resilience
features.text: The hit point maximum of a dwarf is increased by 1, and it increases by 1 every time the dwarf gains a level.

features.title: Dwarven Combat Training
features.text: As an action, you can touch a piece of nonmagical metal and imbue it with one of your smith’s specialties, as if you had cast the magic weapon spell on it. For the purpose of this trait, a martial weapon is a melee or ranged weapon that requires an Attack roll, and a ranged weapon is any weapon that can be used to make a ranged Attack.

features.title: Tool Proficiency
features.text: This trait grants you proficiency with the artisan’s tools of your choice: smith’s tools, brewer’s supplies, or mason’s tools.

features.title: Stonecunning
features.text: The dwarf has advantage on Intelligence (History) checks related to the origin of stonework, and it can make such checks untrained.
